metadata.title: CVE-2023-31207 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Transmission of credentials within query parameters in Checkmk <= 2.1.0p26,<= 2.0.0p35, and <= 2.2.0b6 (beta) may cause the automation user's secretto be written to the site Apache access log.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
